title: City Council Approves Downtown Plan
summary: After months of debate, the city council approved the revitalization project.
details: The comprehensive plan includes mixed-use developments, green spaces, and improved public transportation infrastructure. Construction begins next quarter.

title: Tech Company Expands Operations
summary: Local tech firm announces major hiring spree and office expansion.
details: The company plans to add 200 new positions over the next six months, focusing on engineering and data science roles.
